mcdutil.commands.createFile.title: Create Datapack file
mcdutil.commands.scoreOperation.title: Convert Formula to Score Operation
mcdutil.commands.copyResourcePath.title: Copy ResourcePath
mcdutil.config.dateFormat: Format of the date and time assigned by Date of the generation variable (Format See [here](https://github.com/felixge/node-dateformat#mask-options) for the format)
mcdutil.config.scoreOperation.prefix: **Convert formula to Score Operation**: Scoreholder prefix
mcdutil.config.scoreOperation.objective: **Convert formula to Score Operation**: Score Objective name
mcdutil.config.scoreOperation.temp: **Convert formula to Score Operation**: Variables that are temporarily saved on the way
mcdutil.config.scoreOperation.forceInput: **Convert formula to Score Operation**: How to enter formula
Use InputBox if there is no Selection
mcdutil.config.scoreOperation.isAlwaysSp: **Convert formula to Score Operation**: Whether the user should specify the score object of the variable one by one (if false, then `#mcdutil.scoreOperation.objective#` is referenced)
mcdutil.config.scoreOperation.customOper: **Convert formula to Score Operation**: Custom operate table
Its arity count (e.g. the "+" has 2 arity)

Formula is " 'arg1' 'identifier' 'arg2' "
This midway defined: "former" "op" "latter"

If true, let "former" be 'arg1',
but false, let "former" be 'arg2'

Formula is " 'arg1' 'identifier' 'arg2' "
This midway defined: "former" "op" "latter"

Choose from "*=", "/=", "%=", "+=", "-=", or "="

Formula is " 'arg1' 'identifier' 'arg2' "
This midway defined: "former" "op" "latter"

If true, let "latter" be 'arg2',
but false, let "latter" be 'arg1'
When you want to add Customized Function, this "identifier" must match "/\S+\(/", a regular expression
A temporary variable. used when replacing with "namely" (the number is the number of "arity")
Set by "args" and another expression represented by the four arithmetic operations and the operations defined in this custom operator table
mcdutil.config.scoreOperation.valueScale: **Convert formula to Score Operation**: Values' scale ("Entered value" times "this scale" equals "Calculating Value")
mcdutil.config.createDatapackTemplate.cu: The name displayed in the selection field
Whether it is selected by default (default: false)
Relative file path under DatapackName (In case of file, extension is required)
\\ : * ? " < > | cannot be used for file/folder names
File contents (Basically one item is interpreted as one line)
mcdutil.config.createDatapackTemplate.da: Version of vanilla data to use
mcdutil.config.createFile.fileTemplate: **Create Datapack file**: Contents described when the file is generated (can be set for each file type)
